paper_abstract: We establish some stability results concerning the cubic functional equation f(2x +y) +f(2x -y) = 2f(x +y) + 2f(x -y) + 12f(x) in fuzzy normed spaces. We discuss the fuzzy continuity of the cubic mappings and show that the existence of a solution for any approximately cubic mapping guarantees the completeness of the fuzzy normed space.
